Instruction: Combine flour, milk, and eggs in a bowl; allow to rest for 2 hours.
In a bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar. In a separate bowl, combine the eggs, milk, and melted butter; mix until smooth.
Bake in the preheated oven for 15 to 20 minutes, or until the tops are golden brown and a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, approximately 10 minutes.
